We have config.env document for global variables...

-----------------------------------------------------
# Server Variables

PORT = we define it for which server we'll use.

NODE_ENV = for which environment we will use
-----------------------------------------------------
# MongoDb Connection

MONGO_URI = (URI = Uniform Resource Identifier) this uri coming from our mongoDb connection.
-----------------------------------------------------
# Json Web Token
JWT_SECRET_KEY = for encoding our JWT's. We can only decode with this key.

JWT_EXPIRE = its showing how long tokens will be active.
-----------------------------------------------------
# Cookie
